TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(object sender, WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs)
public delegate void WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs ^ e);
type WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler = delegate of obj * WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示处理 的 事件的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> 需要打印作业的时，将发生此事件 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 。
当创建 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler> 委托时，请标识将处理事件的方法。 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。
